HomeTechnical SEO
Technical SEO Services

Build the Technical Foundation for Scalable Growth

Crawlability issues, slow page speeds, and poor site architecture are silently killing your rankings. We find and fix every technical barrier to organic growth.

Your Content Won't Rank on a Broken Foundation

You can write the best content in your industry, but if search engines can't properly crawl, render, and index your pages, none of it matters. Technical SEO is the unsexy work that makes everything else possible.

We run 300+ point technical audits that go far beyond surface-level checks. We analyze crawl logs, identify rendering issues, optimize site architecture, fix canonicalization problems, and ensure your pages load in under 2 seconds on every device.

Our technical SEO team includes former engineering leads who understand not just what needs fixing, but how to implement fixes without disrupting your development workflow.

From JavaScript-heavy single-page applications to enterprise sites with millions of URLs, we've diagnosed and resolved technical issues across every major platform and tech stack. We work directly with your engineering team to prioritize fixes by SEO impact and development effort.

Technical debt compounds over time. The longer crawl issues, duplicate content, and performance problems go unaddressed, the harder they become to fix -- and the more organic traffic you lose to competitors with cleaner foundations.

Our Process

A methodical approach to uncovering and resolving every technical issue impacting your organic performance.

Comprehensive Audit

We crawl your entire site, analyze server logs, review Google Search Console data, and run performance tests to build a complete picture of your technical health.

Prioritized Roadmap

Every issue is categorized by SEO impact and implementation effort, giving your dev team a clear, prioritized backlog they can work through efficiently.

Implementation Support

We work alongside your engineering team to implement fixes, providing detailed technical specs, code snippets, and QA validation for every change.

Ongoing Monitoring

Automated monitoring catches new technical issues as they arise -- from broken pages to performance regressions -- so problems are fixed before they impact rankings.

What We Cover

Every technical dimension that impacts your search engine visibility and user experience.

Core Web Vitals

LCP, FID/INP, and CLS optimization to meet Google's performance thresholds. We diagnose the root causes of slow pages and implement fixes that improve both rankings and user experience.

Crawl Optimization

Crawl budget management, internal linking architecture, XML sitemaps, robots.txt configuration, and log file analysis to ensure search engines discover and index your most important pages efficiently.

Structured Data

Schema markup implementation for rich snippets, FAQ results, product listings, breadcrumbs, and knowledge panel eligibility -- giving your pages enhanced SERP visibility.

Site Architecture

URL structure optimization, information hierarchy design, internal linking strategies, and breadcrumb implementation that help both users and search engines navigate your site logically.

JavaScript SEO

Server-side rendering analysis, dynamic rendering solutions, hydration audits, and JavaScript framework optimization for React, Angular, Vue, and Next.js applications.

Migration Support

Full SEO migration planning for platform changes, domain moves, and site redesigns. We create redirect maps, monitor index coverage, and prevent the traffic drops that derail most migrations.

Frequently Asked Questions

We score every issue by its potential SEO impact and the effort required to fix it. High-impact, low-effort fixes go first -- these are your quick wins. We then work through medium and long-term fixes in a prioritized backlog that aligns with your development cycles.

We do both. For CMS-level changes, schema markup, and configuration updates, we can implement directly. For deeper engineering work, we provide detailed technical specifications, code examples, and work alongside your dev team to ensure proper implementation and QA.

Site migrations are one of our specialties. We've managed hundreds of migrations across platform changes, domain moves, and redesigns. We create comprehensive redirect maps, monitor crawl behavior pre- and post-migration, and have a proven playbook that preserves organic traffic through the transition.

We recommend a comprehensive audit at least twice per year, with continuous automated monitoring in between. Sites that push frequent code changes or have large, dynamic inventories benefit from monthly technical check-ins to catch regressions early before they impact rankings.

JavaScript SEO is a core competency for our team. We work with React, Angular, Vue, Next.js, Nuxt, and other frameworks daily. We diagnose rendering issues, implement server-side rendering or dynamic rendering solutions, and ensure that Googlebot can fully access and index your JavaScript-rendered content.

Stop Leaving Rankings on the Table

Get a comprehensive technical SEO audit that shows you exactly what's holding your site back -- and how to fix it.
